1.20.1.1.2.2: Reworked the mod to use a new system for loading DLCs, which should be more scalable, so I can add things easier and faster in the future. Added support for 1.20.1.
1.20.1.1.2.6: First stable release of the mod. Added a lot of new stuff.
1.20.1.1.2.7.5: Added new spawner blocks + added update checker
1.20.1.1.2.8: Added loot tables for bank structure and completely rebuild it
1.20.1.1.2.8.1: Fixed head icon on the top left in main menu. Just a small visual bug fix
1.20.1.1.2.8.2: Beta - Added new 'Escape portal' block (yet to be used), with with you can escape from upcomming structure - The prison
1.20.1.1.2.9: edited guy spawning and behaviour, edited bank structure generation, lessen prison's parkour's difficulty, edited hunger and damage in prison. Full changelog: https://modrinth.com/mod/notenoughdlc/version/1.2.9
